title: ImageClearRect
name: ImageClearRect
description: Clears the specified rectangle by filling it with the background color of the current drawing surface.

arguments.name: image
arguments.description: The image on which this operation is performed.

arguments.name: x
arguments.description: The X coordinate of the rectangle to clear.

arguments.name: y
arguments.description: The Y coordinate of the rectangle to clear.

arguments.name: width
arguments.description: The width of the rectangle to clear.

arguments.name: height
arguments.description: The height of the rectangle to clear.
